title: Zelensky confirms Ukraine troops in Russia's Belgorod region
snippets: Ukraine's operations in a second region in Russia are explicitly acknowledged for the first time.
summary: Ukraine has officially acknowledged for the first time its operations in a second region within Russia. This marks a notable development in the ongoing conflict, indicating an expansion of Ukraine's military activities. The specific details of the operations or the region targeted were not disclosed in the announcement.
titles: Zelensky confirms Ukraine troops in Russia's Belgorod region

title: Trump threatens new 50% tariffs on China
snippets: The US president warns of the extra tax unless China withdraws its own 34% counter-tariff on US goods.
summary: The US President announced plans to impose an additional tax on imports from China unless Beijing removes its 34% counter-tariff on American products. This move aims to address the ongoing trade tensions between the two countries.
titles: Trump threatens new 50% tariffs on China

title: Hundreds mourn Palestinian-American teen killed by Israeli forces
snippets: Footage shows the moment 14-year-old Palestinian teen Omar Mohammad Rabea was allegedly fatally shot by Israeli forces.
summary: Footage has been released showing the incident where 14-year-old Palestinian teen Omar Mohammad Rabea was allegedly shot and killed by Israeli forces. The video captures the moment leading up to his death.
titles: Hundreds mourn Palestinian-American teen killed by Israeli forces

title: Jurić exits Southampton after PL relegation record
snippets: Southampton have sacked manager Ivan Jurić after the club's relegation from the Premier League, the club confirmed on Monday.
summary: Southampton FC announced on Monday that they have dismissed manager Ivan Jurić following the team's relegation from the Premier League.
titles: Jurić exits Southampton after PL relegation record

title: Leicester lose record 8th in a row without scoring
snippets: Leicester City have become the first Premier League team to lose eight Premier League games in a row without scoring a single goal.
summary: Leicester City has set a new Premier League record by losing eight consecutive matches without scoring any goals. This marks the first time in Premier League history that a team has experienced such a streak of losses combined with a lack of scoring.
titles: Leicester lose record 8th in a row without scoring

title: Donald Trump’s Los Angeles Dodgers Tribute Takes A Very Weird Turn
snippets: The president’s praise of the team went viral, but for the wrong reasons.
summary: The president's commendation of a team gained widespread attention online, but it became notable for unintended, negative reasons. The focus of the viral response was not on the merits of the praise but rather on aspects that drew criticism or mockery.
titles: Donald Trump’s Los Angeles Dodgers Tribute Takes A Very Weird Turn

title: Saints' season 'has been a mess' so should they 'fear' the Championship?
snippets: Former Premier League striker Chris Sutton says Southampton's season "has been a mess" and he now worries about how they will shape-up in the Championship again next season.  The jubilant scenes at Wembley last May now feel like an age ago with the aim now being to just simply pick up as many points as possible to avoid being the worst Premier League team in history.  "I've got sympathy for Southampton because we've the seen the newly promoted sides really struggle," said Sutton on BBC Radio 5 Live's Monday Night Club.
summary: Former Premier League striker Chris Sutton expressed concerns about Southampton's performance, describing their season as a "mess" and expressing worries about their future in the Championship. On BBC Radio 5 Live's Monday Night Club, he reflected on the contrast between the team's past jubilation at Wembley and their current goal of avoiding becoming the worst team in Premier League history. Sutton also showed sympathy for Southampton, acknowledging the struggles newly promoted teams often face.
titles: Saints' season 'has been a mess' so should they 'fear' the Championship?

title: Emotion the key for inconsistent Dortmund against Barcelona
snippets: Enduring another disappointing domestic season, Borussia Dortmund will take inspiration from last year's incredible European run ahead of Wednesday's Champions League quarter-final first leg at Barcelona.This year, Dortmund sit eighth in the league and are in danger of missing the Champions League for just the second time since the 2010-11 season.
summary: Borussia Dortmund, currently eighth in their domestic league and at risk of missing out on next year's Champions League, aims to draw inspiration from their previous European performance. They are set to face Barcelona in the Champions League quarter-final first leg on Wednesday, hoping to recreate last year's remarkable run in the competition.
titles: Emotion the key for inconsistent Dortmund against Barcelona

title: China vows ‘fight to the end’ after Trump threatens extra 50% tariff
snippets: Beijing and Washington exchange warnings of retaliation as markets stabilise
summary: Beijing and Washington have issued mutual warnings of retaliation, amid a period of stabilized markets. This development marks a significant moment in the ongoing tensions between the two capitals. The specifics of the warnings or potential areas of retaliation were not disclosed, but the exchange signals a continued strain in diplomatic relations.
titles: China vows ‘fight to the end’ after Trump threatens extra 50% tariff

title: Japan secures priority tariff negotiations with Trump
snippets: US ally and biggest foreign investor stunned by sweeping levies including on crucial automotive sector
summary: The United States, a key ally and the largest foreign investor in the country in question, has been taken aback by the imposition of comprehensive taxes, notably affecting the vital automotive industry. These sweeping levies have significant implications for both the economic and diplomatic relationships between the two nations.
titles: Japan secures priority tariff negotiations with Trump

title: Powell’s tariff dilemma: defend the economy or contain inflation

summary: Donald Trump's trade war has created challenges for the Federal Reserve, placing it in a difficult position as it navigates the impact of these policies on the economy.
titles: Powell’s tariff dilemma: defend the economy or contain inflation

title: Can companies exploit differences between Trump’s tariff rates?
snippets: Shifting parts of a product’s supply chain may cut charges under ‘rules of origin’ but trying to take advantage comes with risks
summary: Companies can reduce costs by adjusting their product supply chains to meet 'rules of origin' criteria. However, this strategy carries potential risks.
titles: Can companies exploit differences between Trump’s tariff rates?

title: China offers first hint of devaluation with weak renminbi fix
snippets: Beijing permits exchange rate to drop below long-defended level
summary: Beijing has allowed its currency's exchange rate to fall below a previously defended threshold. This move indicates a shift in the country's monetary policy approach. The specific level that was defended has not been maintained, signaling potential changes in economic strategy. The current status is that the exchange rate is now below this key level.
titles: China offers first hint of devaluation with weak renminbi fix

title: Trees capture toxic fingerprint of gold mining in the Amazon
snippets: Mercury pollution accumulating in trees could offer a new way to monitor destructive gold mining operations
summary: Scientists have discovered that mercury pollution, a byproduct of gold mining, is accumulating in trees. This finding offers a novel approach to track and monitor the environmental impact of gold mining operations by analyzing mercury levels in tree tissues.
titles: Trees capture toxic fingerprint of gold mining in the Amazon

title: Experimental medication helps treat cocaine addiction
snippets: A recently developed medication encourages people with cocaine use disorder to reduce their intake of the stimulant – a step towards the first approved drugs to treat the problem
summary: A new medication designed to help individuals with cocaine use disorder has shown promise in encouraging them to lower their cocaine intake. This development represents progress towards potentially the first approved drugs aimed at treating this specific disorder.
titles: Experimental medication helps treat cocaine addiction

title: No, the dire wolf has not been brought back from extinction
snippets: Colossal Biosciences claims three pups born recently are dire wolves, but they are actually grey wolves with genetic edits intended to make them resemble the lost species
summary: Colossal Biosciences recently announced the birth of three pups, initially claimed to be dire wolves. However, it was clarified that these are actually grey wolves genetically edited to mimic the extinct dire wolf species. The genetic modifications were intended to reproduce characteristics of the ancient animals, not to resurrect the species itself.
titles: No, the dire wolf has not been brought back from extinction

title: Mindfulness and cognitive behavioral therapy improve chronic low back pain
snippets: Eight weeks of mindfulness or cognitive behavioral therapy were associated with improved pain, physical function and quality of life and reduced daily opioid dose in adults with chronic low back pain that required treated with daily opioids, according to a new study. This is one of the largest studies to date to evaluate mindfulness and cognitive behavioral therapy as treatment for opioid-treated chronic pain.
summary: A new study found that eight weeks of mindfulness or cognitive behavioral therapy significantly improved pain, physical function, and quality of life while reducing daily opioid doses in adults with chronic low back pain on daily opioids. This marks one of the largest studies to assess these therapies as treatments for opioid-treated chronic pain.
titles: Mindfulness and cognitive behavioral therapy improve chronic low back pain

title: Rain barrel basics: Conserving water but not mosquito habitats
snippets: Researchers surveyed residential rain barrels to determine how often mosquitoes took up residence in rain barrels and what preventative measures would most effectively keep mosquitoes out. Taking these preventative measures will reduce potential health risks and ensure that rain barrels remain a safe, effective, and environmentally sustainable tool for managing stormwater runoff.
summary: Researchers conducted a survey on residential rain barrels to assess mosquito infestation rates and identify effective prevention methods. The study found that implementing certain measures can significantly reduce the presence of mosquitoes, mitigating health risks and maintaining the environmental benefits of using rain barrels for stormwater management.
titles: Rain barrel basics: Conserving water but not mosquito habitats
